impact-statement: A 2-year field study has demonstrated that volatile compounds produced by plants when they are attacked by herbivores act as defenses by attracting predators to the herbivores and increasing the reproduction of the plants.

present-address.pa1: Federal Research Center for Cultivated Plants Institute for Breeding Research on Horticultural And Fruit Crops, Julius Kühn Institute, Dresden, Germany
